hero.headline: Oscar builds fast, reliable backends that scale.
hero.subhead: I design APIs, pipelines, and distributed systems that keep data consistent, customers happy, and teams shipping without fear.

projects.title: Top 5 Backend Projects
projects.subtitle: Systems that move money, data, and decisions.

items.name: The Coastal Project - Time Tracking SaaS
items.description: Built a reliable backend for time tracking, invoicing exports, and secure tenant data isolation for a short/long term rentals client.
items.summary: Provided the backend architecture and implementation for a scalable time tracking SaaS used by a short/long term rentals client in San Diego, CA.
items.impact: Cut reconciliation time by 92% and reduced chargeback disputes by 36%.

items.name: PulseQueue
items.description: Designed a multi-tenant scheduler that prioritizes workloads, handles retries, and shields downstream services.
items.summary: Multi-tenant job scheduler with dynamic priority lanes, retries, and circuit breakers for critical workloads.

items.name: Atlas Identity
items.description: Implemented a zero-trust auth system with policy-driven access control, token introspection, and rotating keys.
items.summary: Zero-trust auth service with token introspection, rotating keys, and policy-based access control.
items.impact: Reduced auth latency by 41% while supporting 12M monthly users.

items.name: SignalWirehouse
items.description: Shipped a streaming ETL pipeline that transforms IoT telemetry into analytics-ready tables with strict data quality gates.
items.summary: Streaming ETL pipeline that transforms IoT telemetry into analytics-ready tables in near real time.

items.name: ForgePay Core
items.description: Built a payments orchestration layer with fraud scoring, provider failover, and settlement reporting.
items.summary: Payments orchestration layer with fraud scoring, provider failover, and settlement reporting.
items.impact: Improved payment success rate by 8.7% across three regions.

skills.title: What I bring
skills.subtitle: Backend craft, from architecture to on-call resilience.

items.title: Architecture
items.body: Domain-driven APIs, service boundaries, and evolutionary systems.

items.title: Reliability
items.body: SLOs, chaos testing, and incident response playbooks that stick.

items.title: Data Systems
items.body: Streaming, warehousing, and pipeline automation for real-time intel.

items.title: Security
items.body: Threat modeling, compliance-driven logging, and secrets governance.

contact.title: Need a backend that won't blink?
contact.body: Share your roadmap and I'll outline a plan in 48 hours. I can jump in on architecture, delivery, or a full build.

footer.right: Based in the U.S. | Available worldwide
